content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. To help you with your plumbing needs, may I have your name please?
Nice to meet you, Susan! Can you please provide your address so I can check if we service your area?
Thank you. Let me check our service area for your address...
I'm sorry, Susan, but we are having trouble verifying your address in our system. Could you please confirm or provide more details about your location?
No, that's definitely my address. I don't know why there is trouble. Can you still help?

I understand, Susan. Unfortunately, without confirming your address in our service area, I can't proceed with booking an appointment. Let me escalate this issue to a human operator who might assist you further.
